citation.article-title: Yokenella regensburgei gen. nov., sp. nov.: a new genus and species in the family Enterobacteriaceae.
citation.source: Japanese Journal of Medical Science & Biology

p.s: Yokenella (arbitrarily constructed name derived from the Japanese abbreviation "Yoken" for the National Institute of Health, Tokyo, and a modern latin feminine noun formed by adding the diminutive ending "-ella" to the noun "Yoken".)
The proposed genus Yokenella is monotypic and a description of the genus is also given as that of species, Yokenella regensburgei sp. nov.
